LanguageData.ElectricityMeterResearch.label: Electricity meter
LanguageData.ElectricityMeterResearch.description: Allows construction of a power meter that can monitor and display electricity usage on a power network.
LanguageData.ElectricityMeter.label: electricity meter
LanguageData.ElectricityMeter.description: A meter that connects to a power grid and displays the power usage of all devices on that network.
